question: Which Indian actor ranks 8th position in the highest paid actor, according to the Forbes List.
explanation: According to the Forbes List, From India, Shahrukh Khan is the highest paid actor (Rank 8) followed by Salman Khan and Akshay Kumar. Rapper-turned-actor Mark Wahlberg is Hollywood's highest-paid leading man, earning $68 million pretax in 12 month scoring period.
